mapper.select: SELECT CONCAT(ID_TY,ID_SE,LPAD(ID_SN,9,'0')) AS ID FROM T_ID_SN WHERE ID_TY = #{idTy} AND ID_SE = #{idSe}
SELECT CONCAT(TO_CHAR(NOW(),'HH24MISS'),LPAD(ID_SN,9,'0')) AS ID FROM T_ID_SN WHERE ID_TY = #{idTy} AND ID_SE = #{idSe}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO T_ID_SN (ID_TY, ID_SE, ID_SN, MODI_DT) VALUES (#{idTy}, #{idSe}, 1, NOW()) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE ID_SN = T_ID_SN.ID_SN + 1 , MODI_DT = NOW()
